Class RenderPortletFromString

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>

          • org.jgrapes.portal.events.RenderPortletFromString
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<Void>, Associator, Eligible

    public class RenderPortletFromString
extends RenderPortlet

    Send to the portal for adding or updating a portlet. The content is provided as string.

      • RenderPortletFromString

        public RenderPortletFromString(String portletId,
                               Portlet.RenderMode mode,
                               Set<Portlet.RenderMode> supportedModes,
                               String content)

        Creates a new event.

        Parameters:
        portletId - the id of the portlet
        mode - the view mode that is to be updated
        supportedModes - the modes supported by the portlet
        content - a string that defines the portlet view (as HTML)
